tool_description: An API showing all the latest crypto news around the world
name: Latest Crypto News
title: Latest Crypto News

api_list.name: Get Individual News from Specific Source
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the latest news from a specific source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-crypto-news2.p.rapidapi.com/news/independent"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-crypto-news2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-crypto-news2.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-crypto-news2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Crypto News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the latest crypto news from your favorite sources.
